title: Hospital Empire - Idle Tycoon
description:
Fan of clicker and hospital games? Welcome to this hospital simulator where you can build a medical empire and become a rich idle tycoon.

Fan of hospital games? You’ll absolutely love Hospital Empire - Idle Tycoon. Build new departments, treat customers, and hire new staff to make your empire prosper. Making money is easy with business tycoon and clicker mechanics, what are you waiting to become the greatest millionaire in hospital games and build your own empire?

Features:
★ Manage the staff. If you’ve already played hospital games you’ll know how crucial it is to hire and upgrade salaries to make more money. Build the most qualified team to help patients!
★ Become a true idle tycoon.  Business simulator mechanics allow you to make tons of money even when you are not playing. Once you come back to the game you’ll receive all your cash of passive earnings!
★ Unlock new areas. Build the biggest idle tycoon empire of hospital games! Expand your facilities and customer base.

summary: Build the biggest hospital empire and become a rich idle tycoon - Hospital Games
developerAddress: Calle Cardenal Bueno Monreal 50, 2da Planta, Sevilla, 41013
